original_title: 元同級生で僕をイジメていた黒ギャルがまさかの義姉に！ 旦那で満足しないドビッチにクソザコ乳首をイジリ倒される僕。
overview: "Huh? Could it be you?" Because of moving trouble, my brother took his wife and evacuated temporarily... Ranka-chan, who was bullying me when I was a student! ? It brings back bitter memories. I thought I wouldn't get involved too much until I left here, but my brother started by telling me if I wouldn't be offended. If you have a chance, you'll pinch your nipples, sweetly bite your cheeks, crush your feet with your feet... even your cock will be messed with as much as you like and you'll feel frustrated ~~!
title: My Former Classmate Is A Tanned Gal Who Used To Bully Me, But Now, To My Surprise, She Has Become My Big Sister-In-Law! Since She’s No Longer Satisfied With Her Husband, This Bitch Has Taken To Tweaking My Nipples And Teasing Me To Death. Ranka
